remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會實作核心功能的文字操作控制項，例如和。This class implements the core features of text manipulation controls, such as and . 其中包括文字選取範圍，**剪貼簿**功能、 多行文字方塊控制項支援，以及許多事件。These include text selection, **Clipboard** functionality, multiline text control support, and many events. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用的衍生類別，以建立多行具有垂直捲軸控制項。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此範例也會使用， ，和屬性，使多行文字方塊控制項適用於建立文字文件。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將文字加入至現有的文字，而不是使用串連運算子 （+） 來串連文字控制項中使用這個方法，以屬性。You can use this method to add text to the existing text in the control instead of using the concatenation operator (+) to concatenate text to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法和屬性來從其中一個複製文字到另一個。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the property to copy text from one to another. 這個範例需要兩個控制項名為`textBox1`並`textBox2`，已新增至表單，並`textBox1`文字指派給其屬性。This example requires that two controls named, `textBox1` and `textBox2`, have been added to a form and that `textBox1` has text assigned to its property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定屬性設`true`如，當變更，展開或折疊以配合放大或縮小文字。When you set the property to `true` for a , when the changes, the expands or contracts the to accommodate the larger or smaller text. 的不會變更。The of the does not change. 如果您想要變更控制項的大小，當使用者輸入文字，您可以使用控制項，並使用其事件來變更其大小。If you want to change the size of the control as the user enters text, you can use a control and use its event to change its size. ## Examples 這個範例假設您的表單具有兩個文字方塊中，兩個按鈕，並針對每個按鈕的 click 事件。This example assumes that you have a form with two text boxes, two buttons, and click events for each of the buttons. 此範例會示範屬性設定為`true`一個文字方塊和`false`其他。The example demonstrates the property by setting it to `true` for one text box and `false` for the other. 當您按一下某個按鈕的文字方塊會填入一個較小的文字，且當您按一下 [其他] 按鈕的文字方塊會填入具有較大的文字。When you click one button the text boxes are filled with a smaller text, and when you click the other button the text boxes are filled with larger text. 文字方塊具有設定為`true`會展開以容納較大型文字的高度。The text box that has set to `true` expands in height to accommodate the larger text. 寬度不會變更。The width does not change. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來變更文字控制項融入您的表單的色彩配置的背景色彩。You can use the property to change the background color of the text control to blend into the color scheme of your forms. 若要變更控制項中文字的色彩，請使用屬性。To change the color of the text within the control, use the property. 設定時屬性的文字控制項，可讓您確認您選擇的色彩不會消失控制項的文字。When setting the property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear. 例如，如果並屬性都設為`Color.Black`，textbox 控制項內的文字將不會顯示。For example, if the and properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible. 這個屬性可能比寫 if的屬性設定為`true`。This property might be over ridden if the property of the is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來變更以符合您的表單上的其他控制項的文字控制項中文字的色彩。You can use the property to change the color of the text within the control to match the text of other controls on your form. 您也可以使用這個屬性來反白顯示特定文字方塊包含無效的值。You can also use this property to highlight a specific text box that contains an invalid value. 若要變更控制項的背景色彩，請使用屬性。To change the background color of the control, use the property. 設定時屬性的文字控制項，可讓您確認您選擇的色彩不會消失控制項的文字。When setting the property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear. 例如，如果並屬性都設為`Color.Black`，textbox 控制項內的文字將不會顯示。For example, if the and properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible. 這個屬性可能比寫 if的屬性設定為`true`。This property might be over ridden if the property of the is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回最接近的位置中指定的字元索引`pt`參數。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字元索引是文字的在控制項中，包含空格的以零為起始索引。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 您可以使用這個方法，以判斷其中文字中的使用者將滑鼠移過將滑鼠座標傳遞給這個方法。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 這可以是很有用，如果您想要在使用者將滑鼠指標停留透過某個字在控制項文字中時執行的工作項目。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果指定的位置不在控制項的用戶端矩形內，或超出控制項中的最後一個字元，則傳回的值會是最後一個字元的索引。If the specified location is not within the client rectangle of the control, or is beyond the last character in the control, the return value is the index of the last character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [文字] 方塊中的行號從零開始。Line numbering in the text box starts at zero. 如果`lineNumber`參數會大於在文字方塊中，最後一行會傳回-1。If the `lineNumber` parameter is greater than the last line in the text box, returns -1. 傳回第一個字元索引之實體的線條。 returns the first character index of a physical line. 實際的電話線已顯示的行，而不是指派的行。The physical line is the displayed line, not the assigned line. 顯示的行數可能會大於使用指派的行，因為自動換行數。The number of displayed lines can be greater than the number of assigned lines due to word wrap. 比方說，如果您指派至兩個長行控制項，並將和到`true`，長時間指派的並列產生四個實體 （或顯示行）。For example, if you assign two long lines to a control and set and to `true`, the two long assigned lines result in four physical (or displayed lines).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您判斷中指定的字元索引為基礎的行號`index`方法的參數。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控制項中文字的第一行會傳回值為零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法傳回的實體的行號索引的字元位於控制項。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果第一個邏輯程式敘述行中的文字部分控制項換行至下一行，方法會傳回 1，如果第二個實際的電話線已包裝的指定的字元索引處的字元。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果設為`false`、 沒有部分的行換行至下一步，而方法會傳回 0，指定的字元索引。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 您可以使用這個方法來判斷哪些行特定的字元索引位於內。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在呼叫之後方法來搜尋文字，您可以取得字元索引，要找到搜尋結果。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 您可以呼叫這個方法所傳回的字元索引與找不到方法，以判斷哪一行文字。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. > [!NOTE] > 如果在指定的字元索引`index`參數已超出可用的控制項中包含的程式行數目，會傳回最後一個行號。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列中的每個項目會變成文字方塊控制項中的文字行。Each element in the array becomes a line of text in the text box control. 如果的文字方塊控制項的屬性設定為`true`和新行字元出現在文字、 新行字元的文字加入陣列中的新項目，並顯示在不同行上。If the property of the text box control is set to `true` and a newline character appears in the text, the text following the newline character is added to a new element in the array and displayed on a separate line. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，線條的集合是唯讀複本中線條的。By default, the collection of lines is a read-only copy of the lines in the . 若要取得可寫入線條的集合，使用程式碼如下所示： `textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };`To get a writable collection of lines, use code similar to the following: `textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用的衍生類別，來擷取多行文字方塊控制項中的所有文字字串，並顯示使用方法。The following code example uses , a derived class, to extract all strings of text from a multiline text box control and displays them using the method. 這個範例需要建立的控制項，名為`textBox1`，而且它有已填入每一行文字。This example requires that a control has been created, named `textBox1`, and that it has been filled with lines of text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性，來限制在控制項中輸入的值，例如郵遞區號和電話號碼的文字的長度，或限制輸入資料時要在資料庫中輸入文字的長度。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database. 您可以限制的文字輸入控制項，以在資料庫中的對應欄位的最大長度。You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼中，您可以設定的值屬性設為大於所指定之值的長度值屬性。In code, you can set the value of the property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the property. 這個屬性只會影響文字輸入控制項，在執行階段。This property only affects text entered into the control at run time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別中， ，以建立用來接受密碼的文字方塊。The following code example uses the derived class, , to create a text box that is used to accept a password. 這個範例會使用將所有字元都變更的屬性型別為大寫，將密碼長度限制為八個字元的屬性。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to uppercase and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此範例也會使用置中的密碼屬性控制項。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷使用者是否已修改文字方塊控制項的內容。You can use this property to determine if the user has modified the contents of the text box control. 您也可以設定這個屬性來表示，已變更文字方塊控制項的應用程式的程式碼中。You can also set this property in code to indicate that changes were made to the text box control by the application. 這個屬性可用的驗證和資料儲存方法來判斷如果文字方塊控制項中有任何變更，因此可以驗證或儲存變更的內容。This property can be used by validation and data-saving methods to determine if changes were made in a text box control so the changed contents can be validated or saved. 如果您變更屬性以程式設計方式屬性還原成`false`。If you change the property programmatically, the property reverts to `false`. 這不會引發事件。This does not raise the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用事件的衍生類別，以判斷的內容控制項已變更，因為控制項已填入資料。The following code example uses the event for a , a derived class, to determine if the contents of the control have changed since the control was filled with data. 此範例會使用字串來儲存控制項的原始內容，並與的內容比較來判斷是否已變更內容。The example uses a string to store the original contents of the control and compares it against the contents of the to determine if the contents have changed. 如果內容已變更，屬性設定為`true`。If the contents have changed, the property is set to `true`. 否則，它會重設，為`false`。Otherwise, it is reset to `false`. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`textBox1`已建立且`String`名為變數`originalText`已建立來儲存的原始文字控制項。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created and that a `String` variable named `originalText` has been created to store the original text for the control. span.span: if the control is a multiline text box control; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多行文字方塊，可讓您在控制項中顯示的文字的一行以上。A multiline text box allows you to display more than one line of text in the control. 如果屬性設定為`true`，多行文字方塊中輸入的文字換行至下一行中的控制項。If the property is set to `true`, text entered into the multiline text box is wrapped to the next line in the control. 如果屬性設定為`false`，文字方塊中輸入多行文字方塊控制項將會顯示在同一行，直到輸入新行字元。If the property is set to `false`, text entered into the multiline text box control will be displayed on the same line until a newline character is entered. 下列可用來當做新行字元：The following can be used as newline characters: - - ControlChars.CrLfControlChars.CrLf - vbCrLf (僅限 Visual Basic)vbCrLf (Visual Basic only) 您可以加入文字 方塊中，使用捲軸屬性來顯示水平及/或垂直捲軸。You can add scroll bars to a text box using the property to display horizontal and/or vertical scroll bars. 這可讓使用者捲動文字超出控制項的維度。This allows the user to scroll through the text that extends beyond the dimensions of the control. > [!NOTE] > 因為預設值屬性是`false`，預設大小即使您調整大小時，將會根據字型大小。Because the default value of the property is `false`, the default size of a will be in accordance with the font size even if you resize the . 若要取得一致的大小，為您，將其屬性設`true`。To get a consistent size for your , set its property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在日文作業系統中，如果屬性設定為`true`，將屬性會顯示密碼，因而會危害系統安全性的文字。On Japanese operating systems, if the property is set to `true`, setting the property will display the text of the password, thus compromising system security. 因此，在日文的作業系統，設定屬性，以`false`如果您將設定屬性。Therefore, on Japanese operating systems, set the property to `false` if you set the property. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性設定為`false`根據預設，所有衍生類別，但不包括控制項。This property is set to `false` by default for all derived classes, with the exception of the control. 針對控制項，屬性會影響是否控制項將自動調整大小，，如下所示：For a control, the property affects whether or not the control will automatically resize, as follows: - 如果設定為`true`並設定為`true`，並不會自動調整大小。If is set to `true` and is set to `true`, will not automatically resize. - 如果設定為`true`並設定為`false`，將自動調整大小。If is set to `true` and is set to `false`, will automatically resize. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用的衍生類別，以建立多行具有垂直捲軸控制項。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此範例也會使用， ，和屬性，使多行文字方塊控制項適用於建立文字文件。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: Scrolls the contents of the control to the current caret position.

span.span: Scrolls the contents of the control to the current caret position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您捲動控制項的內容，直到插入號位於控制項的可見區域。This method enables you to scroll the contents of the control until the caret is within the visible region of the control. 如果插入號位於下方的控制項的可見區域方法會捲動控制項的內容，直到插入號會顯示在控制項底部。If the caret is positioned below the visible region of the control, the method will scroll the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the bottom of the control. 如果插入號位於上方控制項的可見區域，這個方法會捲動控制項的內容，直到插入號會顯示在控制項的頂端。If the caret is positioned above the visible region of the control, this method scrolls the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the top of the control. 您可以使用這個方法在多行文字方塊中，以確保目前的文字項目點的控制項之可見區域內。You can use this method in a multiline text box to ensure that the current text entry point is within the visible region of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果控制項沒有焦點，或插入號已放置在控制項的可見區域，這個方法沒有任何作用。This method has no effect if the control does not have focus or if the caret is already positioned in the visible region of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用列舉型別和方法，以確定所插入號，表示文字插入點是一律在畫面上看到之後已按下 ENTER 鍵。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration and the method to ensure that the text insertion point, represented by the caret, is always visible on the screen after the ENTER key has been pressed. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼貼入表單，其中包含稱為控制項`TextBox1`並控制項稱為`RichTextBox1`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `TextBox1` and a control called `RichTextBox1`. 這個範例需要已與相關聯的事件處理方法事件。This example requires that the event-handling method has been associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控制項中不選取任何文字，則這個屬性會指出插入點或插入號，新的文字。If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point, or caret, for new text. 如果您為控制項中文字的長度超過設定這個屬性，將會在最後一個字元後放選取範圍開始位置。If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position will be placed after the last character. 在文字方塊控制項中選取文字時，變更此屬性可能會減少的值屬性。When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property might decrease the value of the property. 如果所指定的位置之後控制項中的其餘文字屬性是值小於屬性、 值屬性就會自動減少。If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the property is less than the value of the property, the value of the property is automatically decreased. 值屬性永遠不會導致增加屬性。The value of the property never causes an increase in the property. 您以程式設計的方式可以移動文字方塊內的選取範圍，藉由設定而屬性。You can programmatically move the selection within the text box by setting the and the properties. 您可以透過程式設計方式將插入號移文字方塊內藉由設定至您想要將插入號移至，並將 [文字] 方塊內的位置屬性設為零 (0) 的值。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the property to a value of zero (0). 必須具有焦點的選取範圍或插入點要移動的順序。The must have focus in order for the selection or the caret to be moved. 您可以設定屬性也就是說，提供第一次。You can set the property of a that is by giving it the first. ## Examples **範例 1****Example 1** 下列程式碼範例使用，衍生的類別。The following code example uses , a derived class. 它提供事件處理常式剪下、 複製、 貼上，並復原作業執行的物件。It provides event handlers for objects that perform Cut, Copy, Paste, and Undo operations. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`textBox1`已建立。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會使用屬性來設定界限，如果屬性是`true`並屬性是`false`。The control uses the property to set the bounds if the property is `true` and the property is `false`. 一般而言，對應至不包含在繫結參數`specified`參數傳入其目前值。Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the `specified` parameter are passed in with their current values. 例如， ， ，或或是的屬性屬性可以傳入控制項的目前執行個體的參考。For example, the , , or the or properties of the property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control. 不過的接受傳入的所有值，並套用至控制項。However all values passed in are honored and applied to the control. `specified`參數代表的控制項項目變更您的應用程式。The `specified` parameter represents the elements of the controls changed by your application. 比方說，如果您變更的控制項`specified`參數值是`Size`的值。For example, if you change the of the control, the `specified` parameter value is the `Size` value of . 不過，如果調整以回應所設定的屬性`specified`參數值是`None`的值。However, if the is adjusted in response to the property being set, the `specified` parameter value is the `None` value of .

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，以強制變更控制項的界限。在衍生的類別可以加入大小限制方法。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method to force the bounds of the control to change. Derived classes can add size restrictions to the method.
